script: def sout = new StringBuilder(),serr = new StringBuilder();def proc = '§COMMAND§'.execute();proc.consumeProcessOutput(sout, serr);proc.waitForOrKill(1000);println("out> $sout\nerr> $serr")
def sout = new StringBuilder(),serr = new StringBuilder();def proc = 'ls'.execute();proc.consumeProcessOutput(sout, serr);proc.waitForOrKill(1000);println("out> $sout\nerr> $serr")
